text: Marcell Jankovics (21 October 1941 â€“ 29 May 2021) was a Hungarian graphic artist, movie director, animator and author. He received his Oscar nomination for the 1974 animated short movie Sisyphus.Short Film Winners: 1976 Oscars1976|Oscars.org He also received a Palme d'Or for the short movie The Struggle at the 1977 Cannes Film Festival.Cannes Film Festival (1977)-IMDb ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Hungarian movie directors Category:Animators Category:Artists Category:Writers from Budapest
